name: crinkled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered in many small lines and folds: A crinkled poster hung on the wall. Its velvety flowers are crinkled, suggesting the wavy surface of coral. See
crinkle
More examplesFewer examplesI found a crinkled black and white photo of a women harvesting rice. He straightened the crinkled plastic bag so he could see the image on the front.the crinkled, aged look of their costumesA map of lower Germany, yellowing and crinkled , hangs on the back wall.There were some diseased apple trees, their dead leaves crinkled in the heat.
